G

Game - Class in com.company.utility
Holds information that every game possesses
Game(Player, Player, int, int) - Constructor for class com.company.utility.Game
Initializing game which means: setting the board size to the @param boardSize, creating the board with such dimension, setting (by default) the turn to the player (user) and reloading the board.
GameFrame - Class in com.company.gui
Custom JFrame class that holds the whole game user interface and functionalities.
GameFrame() - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameFrame
Creates a new instance of this class with the frame title set to a default value and a default gap from the screen edges.
GameFrame(int) - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameFrame
Creates a new instance of this class with the frame title set to a default value and a gap from the screen edges sized with the value of the offset parameter.
GameFrame(String) - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameFrame
Creates a new instance of this class with the frame title set to the value of title parameter and a default gap from the screen edges.
GameFrame(String, int) - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameFrame
Creates a new instance of this class with the frame title set to the value of title parameter and a gap from the screen edges sized with the value of the offset parameter.
GameFrame(String, int, int) - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameFrame
Creates a new instance of this class with the frame title set to the value of title parameter and a gap from the screen edges sized with the values of the leftRight and topBottom parameters.
GameMenu - Class in com.company.gui
Custom JMenu class with custom style to be used in the GameFrame class instances.
GameMenu() - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameMenu
Creates an instance of this class with the menu's title set to an empty string and sets the menu's style.
GameMenu(String) - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameMenu
Creates an instance of this class with the menu's title set to the value of the title parameter and sets the menu's style.
GameMenuItem - Class in com.company.gui
Custom JMenuItem class with custom style to be used in the GameFrame class instances.
GameMenuItem() - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameMenuItem
Creates an instance of this class with the menu item's text set to an empty string and sets the menu item's style.
GameMenuItem(String) - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameMenuItem
Creates an instance of this class with the menu item's text set to the value of the text parameter and sets the menu item's style.
GameRadioButton - Class in com.company.gui
Custom JRadioButton class with custom style to be used in the GameFrame class instances.
GameRadioButton() - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameRadioButton
Creates an instance of this class with the radio button's text set to an empty string and sets the radio button's style.
GameRadioButton(String) - Constructor for class com.company.gui.GameRadioButton
Creates an instance of this class with the radio button's text set to the value of the text parameter and sets the radio button's style.
getBoardSize() - Method in class com.company.utility.Game
Returns an integer value that represents the dimension of the board
getColumn() - Method in class com.company.gui.BoardButton
Mutator method to get the calling BoardButton object's column value.
getColumn() - Method in class com.company.utility.Player.Move
Mutator method to get the calling Move object's column value
getIndex(Player.Move, int) - Static method in class com.company.utility.Player
Static method used to get a short index value out of a Move instance
getLastMove() - Method in class com.company.utility.Player
Accessor method to get the current last move in the game.
getMove(Short, int) - Static method in class com.company.utility.Player
Static method used to get a Move instance based on a Short value and the current game's board size
getNumberOfWins() - Method in class com.company.utility.Player
Mutator method to get the calling Player object's number of wins value
getPlayer1() - Method in class com.company.utility.Game
Returns the first (user) player
getPlayer2() - Method in class com.company.utility.Game
Returns the opponent (user or computer)
getPriorityMoves(Game) - Method in class com.company.utility.AI
Abstract method that will serve to make an Easy, Medium, Hard game scaling
getPriorityMoves(Game) - Method in class com.company.utility.EasyAI
Returns moves that the move(Game) method will consider as options to look at while choosing the best move to play
getPriorityMoves(Game) - Method in class com.company.utility.HardAI
Returns moves that the move(Game) method will consider as options to look at while choosing the best move to play
getPriorityMoves(Game) - Method in class com.company.utility.MediumAI
Returns moves that the move(Game) method will consider as options to look at while choosing the best move to play
